page.title: 05MORE PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
{KISSY CAT. This is a game for girls and boys. Decide whether girls or boys are on. The ones who aren't on have a den. If someone comes out.You chase them until you catch them.Then you kiss them.This goes on until all the people have been kissed.
{HIDE AND DOBBY You chose a tree and run to it and dob it,last person is on.The person who is on,counts up to 50 shuting his eyes. Meanwhile the others have to hide.The person who is on tries to find the others and dob them.The others have to try and dob the tree before they are dobbed.The people who are dobbed are on next.
